attributes.title: THE WORST APP EVA
attributes.review: This app is the epitome of disappointment and frankly a waste of time. I was in pursuit of downloading Minecraft but then found this app. It looked a little racist at first but I ultimately decided to give the app a chance and put a hold on my Minecraft game (bc I didnâ€™t have enough storage to download both apps to my phone). However I soon found out that there were too many bugs and insignificant claims about some egotistical/perverted Cheeto man who used generational wealth to get rid of any accusations made against him (e.g. racism, xenophobia, sexual assault, transphobia, etc.). My expectations for this app were quite diminished and I became very disappointed because I could have spent my time building my Minecraft house and raising some Minecraft sheep. Total waste of my storage space and my time!!
